verses.kjv: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.
verses.ct: I love the LORD because he has listened to my voice and my pleas for help.

verses.kjv: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.
verses.ct: Because he paid attention to me, I will call on him for as long as I live.

verses.kjv: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.
verses.ct: The grip of death surrounded me, and the anguish of the grave took hold of me. I was overwhelmed by trouble and grief.

verses.kjv: Then called I upon the name of the LORD; O LORD, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.
verses.ct: Then I cried out to the LORD: "Please, LORD, rescue my soul!"

verses.kjv: Gracious is the LORD, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.
verses.ct: The LORD is gracious and righteous; yes, our God is merciful.

verses.kjv: The LORD preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.
verses.ct: The LORD watches over the vulnerable. When I was at my lowest, he came to my aid.

verses.kjv: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the LORD hath dealt bountifully with thee.
verses.ct: Be at peace again, my soul, because the LORD has been generous to you.

verses.kjv: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.
verses.ct: You have rescued my soul from death, my eyes from tears, and my feet from stumbling.

verses.kjv: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living.
verses.ct: I will live in the LORD's presence in the land of the living.

verses.kjv: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:
verses.ct: I kept my faith, even when I spoke out of deep suffering.

verses.kjv: I said in my haste, All men are liars.
verses.ct: In my panic I said, "Every person is a liar."

verses.kjv: What shall I render unto the LORD for all his benefits toward me?
verses.ct: How can I repay the LORD for all the good he has done for me?

verses.kjv: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the LORD.
verses.ct: I will raise the cup of salvation and call on the name of the LORD.

verses.kjv: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people.
verses.ct: I will fulfill my promises to the LORD right now, in front of all his people.

verses.kjv: Precious in the sight of the LORD is the death of his saints.
verses.ct: The death of his faithful ones is precious in the LORD's sight.

verses.kjv: O LORD, truly I am thy servant; I am thy servant, and the son of thine handmaid: thou hast loosed my bonds.
verses.ct: LORD, I truly am your servant; I am your servant, the child of your servant woman. You have set me free from my chains.

verses.kjv: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call upon the name of the LORD.
verses.ct: I will bring you a sacrifice of thanksgiving and call on the name of the LORD.

verses.kjv: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people,
verses.ct: I will fulfill my promises to the LORD right now, in front of all his people,

verses.kjv: In the courts of the LORDâ€™s house, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: in the courtyards of the LORD's house, right in the heart of you, Jerusalem. Praise the LORD!
